agents.flight.FPInfoProvider¶

class agents.flight.FPInfoProvider(agent)¶

Bases: Role

FPIP: Flight Plan Information Provider

Description: A wrap around role to provide information on the flight state getting the inforamtion from the flight plan.

__init__(agent)¶

On initialisation of a Role, it gets a pointer to the Agent it belongs to.

Methods
